article.title: CSC Wins USAID Infrastructure Support Task Order
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) has awarded CSC a five-year task order valued at $200 million to provide information technology (IT) infrastructure support services. Under the contract, the company will provide a full range of infrastructure services, including planning, engineering and implementing IT solutions, and providing support for the USAID network environment.
